answers.answer: Try relieving your headache by steam, hot relaxing shower or rest. Usually plain paracetamol works on these headaches and is allowed too, but since you suspect diabetes, don't take any medicines. Just take lots of fluids and rest.
Make sure your eating and drinking water hope your ok
It could be multiple things. Preeclampsia, low blood sugar, high blood pressure, gestation diabetes. Just make sure to bring it up and your doctor will run some test
Drink a lot more water and if you feel dizzy lye down so that you don't fall down should you have syncope(fainting).

question: just about an hour ago I began to have a really bad headache following with dizziness and then I started seeing tracers out of my I slowly not being able to see out of one eye. I don't know if I have diabetes but it runs in the family. I some sugar cubes and it went away but now I have this horrible headache have a doctors appointment on Monday ,what should I do?
title: Dizzy and seeing tracers 9 weeks 3 days pregnant
